apps.name: EmuThreeDS
apps.localizedDescription: EmuThreeDS is a free and open-source Nintendo 3DS emulator for iOS devices. It allows you to play your favorite Nintendo 3DS games on your iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV. EmuThreeDS is still under development, but it is already capable of running many popular Nintendo 3DS games at full speed.

apps.name: PPSSPP
apps.localizedDescription: PPSSPP is the one and only PSP emulator for iOS written in C++. It is capable of running a lot of original games but, depending on the power of your device, not all may run at full speed due to JIT.

apps.localizedDescription: Misaka tweak manager for iOS provides seamless access to repositories housing a vast collection of tweaks, including the comprehensive range of MacDirtyCow packages tailored specifically for iOS 15 and iOS 16. With an extensive library of over 333 packages, Misaka Tweak Manager offers an abundance of options to customize and enhance your device's functionality, all without the requirement of a jailbreak. All iPhones are supported.

apps.localizedDescription: Minecraft for iOS is a universal application! You can play on the iPhone and iPad. The game is constantly evolving thanks to our free updates. Minecraft is a game based on placing blocks for building things from them! Minecraft Pocket Edition includes randomly generated worlds, multiplayer over Wi-Fi networks, survival and creative mode. You can work and create your new world with friends. In the latest update, monsters from the game Creepers are added. They are big and green. But this is just one of many updates.

apps.name: uYouPlus
apps.subtitle: The best tweak for the YouTube app just got even better
apps.versionDescription:
â€¢ Fix stretched artwork in uYou's player view
â€¢ Fix crash on startup after closing with uYou download in progress
â€¢ Update DontEatMyContent (v1.0.6 -> v1.0.10)

Full changelog: 
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/releases/tag/v18.14.1-3.0
apps.localizedDescription:
uYou is the best tweak for the YouTube app.

uYouPlus is a modified version of uYou with even more features.

Additional features:
â€¢ Skip sponsorships in videos (iSponsorBlock)
â€¢ Even more PiP options (YouPiP)
â€¢ Unlock 1440p and 2160p resolutions (YTUHD)
â€¢ Disable overlay at the end of videos (YTNoHoverCards)
â€¢ Remove YouTube Premium upsell alerts (NoYTPremium)
â€¢ Enable the miniplayer for all videos (YTMiniplayerEnabler)
â€¢ Prevent the notch/Dynamic Island from cutting into 2:1 videos (DontEatMyContent)
â€¢ Configure A/B settings in the YouTube app (YTABConfig)
â€¢ And more

More information: 
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/ 

Requires iOS 14.0 or later.

Contributors: MiRO92, qnblackcat, PoomSmart, level3tjg, BandarHelal, galactic, julioverne, HASHBANG, Lyvendia, Foxster, ichitaso, Ahmed Bafkir, CokePokes, Tommy Teo, theos, and many others.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows YouTube to upload media from your photo library.
Allows YouTube to play audio in the background.

privacy.name: AppleMusic
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.

privacy.name: Contacts
privacy.usageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Spotify to upload media from your photo library for use as playlist cover, profile picture, etc.
Allows Spotify to play audio in the background.

privacy.name: BluetoothAlways
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.

privacy.name: UserTracking
privacy.usageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.

privacy.name: PhotoLibraryAdd
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.

privacy.name: AppleMusic
privacy.usageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you prepopulate the SSID field with the currently connected network.

privacy.name: FaceID
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.
